short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom DuckDuckGo bangs/shortcuts using the search bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Shortcut brings the power of DuckDuckGo's bang commands to Chrome, allowing you to search hundreds of websites directly from your address bar. Simply type '!' followed by a shortcut and your query to instantly search specific sites without visiting them first. For example, '!w climate change' immediately searches Wikipedia, while '!yt cooking tips' takes you straight to YouTube results. This time-saving extension streamlines your web searches, boosts productivity, and puts a wealth of information at your fingertips without changing your default search engine.
